params._auctionId: The auction you want to bid on
params._bidAmount: The amount of the ERC20 token the bid is made of. They should be withdrawable by this contract.
params._highestBid: The current higest bid. Throw if incorrect.

params._auctionId: The auctionId of the auction to complete
The auctionId of the auction to complete

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._contract: The token contract the auctionned token belong to

params._tokenContract: The token contract the auctionned token belong to
params._tokenId: The token ID of the token being auctionned
params._useInitiator: Set to `false` if you want to use the default value registered for the token contract (if wanting to reset to default, use `true`)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._contract: The token contract the auctionned token belong to
params._value: True if bidding/claiming should be allowed.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

bid(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Place a GBM bid for a GBM auction

claimAfterReAuctionned(uint256).notice: Attribute a token to the winner of the auction and distribute the proceeds to the owner of this contract. throw if bidding is disabled or if the auction is not finished.

claimForFirstTime(uint256).notice: Attribute a token to the winner of the auction and distribute the proceeds to the owner of this contract. throw if bidding is disabled or if the auction is not finished.

registerAnAuctionContract(address,uint25.notice: Register an auction contract default parameters for a GBM auction. To use to save gas

registerAnAuctionToken(address,uint256,b.notice: Register an auction token and emit the relevant AuctionInitialized & AuctionStartTimeUpdated events Throw if the token owner is not the GBM smart contract/supply of auctionned 1155 token is insufficient

setBiddingAllowed(address,bool).notice: Allow/disallow bidding and claiming for a whole token contract address.
